titleStmt.title: Making an Interactive Web Application with R and Shiny
titleStmt.author: Yann Ryan

sourceDesc.p: Born digital, in a markdown format. This lesson is original. Available translations are the following:

abstract.p: This lesson demonstrates how to build an interactive webmap using R and the Shiny library. In the lesson, you will design and implement a simple application, consisting of a slider which allows a user to select a date range, and display a set of corresponding points, on an interactive map.
